result.eng: I knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ga: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.orig: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.html: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḟios agam go raiḃ idirḋealú éigin ann idir an dá rud aċ ní raiḃ mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.

result.eng: The televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.
result.ga: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi mórán
result.orig: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi mórán
result.html: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi móránThe televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an teilifís ar siúl sa ċúlra aċ ní raiḃ mé ag féaċaint uirṫi móránThe televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.

result.eng: I wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ga: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn
result.orig: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn
result.html: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ mé anseo an tseaċtain seo caite mar ḃí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.eng: He wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ga: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.orig: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.html: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadhHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sé sásta laḃairt liom a ṫuilleaḋHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.

result.eng: She wasn't willing to help me.
result.ga: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liom
result.orig: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liom
result.html: Ní raibh sí toilteanach cuidiú liomShe wasn't willing to help me.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sí toilteanaċ cuidiú liomShe wasn't willing to help me.

result.eng: I had made promises I wasn't able to keep.
result.ga: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadhI had made promises I wasn't able to keep.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé geallúintí naċ raiḃ mé in ann a ċoṁlíonaḋI had made promises I wasn't able to keep.

result.ga: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap
result.orig: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap
result.html: Ní mise a chum ná a cheapIt wasn't my idea.
result.ponchtml: Ní mise a ċum ná a ċeapIt wasn't my idea.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ga: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.orig: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.html: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí daoine ann ċuala mé ag béiceaḋ iad aċ ní raiḃ mé in ann taḋall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: Níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: Níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: Níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: I guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ga: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.orig: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.html: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟiú an tairḃe an trioblóid b'ḟéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.orig: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.html: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.

result.eng: It wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.

result.eng: I would leave them alone if it wasn't for...
result.html: Ní bhainfinn dóibh murab éI would leave them alone if it wasn't for...
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃainfinn dóiḃ murab éI would leave them alone if it wasn't for...

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!

result.orig: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!

result.ga: Nach raibh go leor den fhear ann

result.html: Nach raibh go leor den fhear annWasn't he man enough?
